item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:20, topic:81621”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=119986.msg1178366#msg1178366 date=1176950664]
Rofl. Your funny. Winter Ice, your not getting poon until at least 25. It wont be nice. A big fat hairy man woman.

Jme, the second one was too long for me, and got pretty dull in some parts.
[/quote]

Yeah I’m pretty patient with long movies. Oh and I almost always smoke a couple bowls before a movie

I think I’ll try and find some nice hash whenever this comes to theatre’s :D[/quote]

Haha. I’m a non smoker, so I fall asleep instead of smoke

The only part of PotC 2 I remmeber vividly is the rolling in the cage, and them swinging to climb the cliff. The rest of it, is just a ‘wtf?’
